name: Soccer Smash
description:
-= Launch discount 50%! =-
Do you have what it takes to reach the top in this colorful 3D action game? Soccer Smash puts you in the shoes of Felix, the new boy in school. In an effort to climb the social ladder and earn a place on the local sports team, he sets out to defeat all the other kids in the latest fad around the yard: Soccer Smash!

* Challenging story mode
* Freeplay mode
* 3 fast-paced minigames
* 8 playable characters
* Powerful special moves
* Easy to learn controls
* Action-packed gameplay
